m_szDocTitle: Robot system that operates through a network firewall - INTOUCH TECHNOLOGIES, INC.
m_szDocSumamry: textArticle -------------------- Robot system that operates through a network firewall United States Patent 9160783 Abstract: A remote controlled robot system that includes a robot and a remote control station that communicate through a communication network. Communication with the robot is limited by a firewall coupled to the communication network. A communication server establishes communication between the robot and the remote control station so that the station can send commands to the robot through the firewall. Inventors: Pinter, Marco (Santa Barbara, CA, US) Application Number: INTOUCH
